title: High level Road
details:
LAND DETAILS

Wetareka is a town located in Western Povince of Sri Lanka. Prime Adhithya is located1km away from High level road (122 Colombo – Awissawella bus route) and only 3km to Godagama town.The nearest City to this prime location is Homagama with all the facilities you need for a better living.

Three Phase Electricity
Well water
20’ to wide road
Close proximity to Meegoad, Homagama, Goadagama
800m to High-level Road
